description: The NEDATS Board of Directors actively fosters connection and professional growth among our members. They provide strategic direction, serve as the primary link to NED University, and ensure ongoing leadership continuity through member-elected board transitions, as defined in our bylaws.

board.name: Anas Hashmi
board.title: President
board.bio: Anas Hashmi has over 20 years of experience in Project Management and Engineering Consulting. After graduating from NED University, he worked with several multinational corporations before taking a leadership role at NEDATS.

board.name: Shakeel Ahmed
board.title: Vice President
board.bio: Shakeel Ahmed is a dedicated Professional with over 3 decades of experience in Engineering & Management. He has extensive experience in leadership roles and has been an active member of the alumni association for many years.

board.name: Maaz Mansoor
board.title: General Secretary
board.bio: Maaz Mansoor is a PMI accredited PMP and PEO registered P. Eng, a senior member of IEEE. He has years of experience in Project Management and Engineering leadership.

board.name: Shahbaz Zubairi
board.title: Finance Secretary
board.bio: Shahbaz Zubairi has a strong background in financial management with over 15 years of experience. He manages the association's finances and ensures transparent financial reporting.

board.name: Hassan Hashmi
board.title: Social Secretary I
board.bio: Hassan Hashmi is responsible for organizing social events and networking opportunities for alumni. He brings creative energy and innovative ideas to strengthen our community.

board.name: Badar Bhatti
board.title: Joint Secretary
board.bio: Badar Bhatti works closely with the General Secretary to coordinate association activities and maintain records. He has been an active member since 2010.

board.name: Salman Khan
board.title: NED Liaison Secretary
board.bio: Salman Khan maintains strong connections with NED University, coordinating joint programs and initiatives between the university and alumni association.

board.name: Habibah Aftab
board.title: Information Secretary
board.bio: Habibah Aftab manages the association's communications channels and ensures members stay informed about news, events, and opportunities.
